name: Deep Root (Ludum Dare 46)
description:
If you enjoyed playing Deep Root  please rate us on the Ludum Dare website! We'd really appreciate it!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/deep-root

---

Deep Root is an FPS tower defense game where your mission is to defend a sun tree while it grows in order to create light for an alien planet. 

Use your multi-tool to fire construction grenades at resource deposits to help the tree grow! 

But be careful, the parasites are waking up to a new day too.

---

Made for Ludum Dare 46 in 72 hours by the Feverdream Softworks team and associated collaborators.

Theme: Keep It Alive.

Programming: Johnny
Texturing: Tim
Concept Art: Shane
3D Modeling: Ben, Tim, Cosme, Shane and Jett
Rigging: Ben
Music: Neb
